description: More shops could be allowed to reopen to the public later this month, the chief minister says.
title: Coronavirus: Further easing of lockdown measures on Isle of Man
title_page: Coronavirus: Further easing of lockdown measures on Isle of Man - BBC News
maintext: Advice for those in vulnerable groups is also set to be adjusted to allow them to leave their homes to exercise for up to an hour each day, and the restarting of non-essential health services was also "being explored".
